property.name: query
query
property.value:
"SELECT 
"+ " {c:PK} as cust, 
"+ " COUNT({o:PK}) as amnt, 
"+ " SUM( CASE WHEN {o:totalPrice} IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE {o:totalPrice} END ) AS tot 
"+ "FROM 
"+ " {Customer AS c LEFT JOIN Order AS o 
"+ " ON {c:PK}={o:user} } 
"+ "WHERE {o:currency} IS NULL OR {o:currency} = ?currency 
"+ "GROUP BY {c:PK}, {c:uid} 
"+ "ORDER BY tot DESC, {c:uid} ASC "

attribute.description: Determines whether user is allowed to login to system.
User retention state, avoiding being picked up again by cronjob if processed
The deactivation date for the user account
Specify code for that contact info.
The date/time when the order will expire

Tells whether delivery costs should be included in discount calculation or not. If this field is true delivery costs are changed the same way as product costs if discount values are set at this order.
Tells whether payment costs should be included in discount calculation or not. If this field is true payment costs are changed the same way as product costs if discount values are set at this order.
List of entry groups for this order.
List of EntryGroup numbers that this order entry belongs to.
The version of the quote. Along with code it makes a quote instance unique.
Current state of the quote
